name: Terraform the Planet!
description:
Terraform the planet to allow animals to migrate!

Keep animals migrating for 10 seconds to complete a level.

An animal can only migrate to a valid adjacent triangle (deer to land, fish to water) and when it does, it consumes it's previous space.

--

Controls:

WASD(QE) - Rotate the Planet

Left Click - Paint Land Triangle

Right Click - Paint Water Triangle

Hold LShift - Increase Paint Radius

--

Fonts from: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts

--

Developed for Weekly Game Jam #112 (Theme - Color Your World)
